items.title: Prediction: 1 Stock That Will Be Worth More Than Nvidia 5 Years From Now
items.description: Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) has been one of the hottest stocks on the market in the past five years, delivering remarkable gains of 1,300% to investors during this period and significantly outpacing the tech-laden Nasdaq Composite's returns of about 100%.  Nvidia's market capitalization of $2.5 trillion makes it the third-largest company globally.  The good part is that Nvidia could deliver more gains in the future thanks to a sizable addressable market that could allow it to sustain healthy revenue and earnings growth for years to come.
